Never let the front line collapse!"},{"lineNumber":153672,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その間隙を突き、魔物共が雪崩れ込んでくるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":" The monsters will crash through any gap!\""},{"lineNumber":153673,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":153674,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ドォォォオオォォォン！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"  <Doooooon!>"},{"lineNumber":153675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んなっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?"},{"lineNumber":153676,"originalJapaneseLine":"コルドバ達のいる地面が突如として揺れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The ground beneath Cordoba and the others suddenly shakes."},{"lineNumber":153677,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは落とし穴の中でシルキィが","translatedEnglishLine":"It was the sound of Silky inside the pitfall"},{"lineNumber":153678,"originalJapaneseLine":"壁に激突した音だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"crashing against the wall."},{"lineNumber":153679,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてシルキィは土煙の中で姿を消した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, Silky disappeared amid a cloud of dust."},{"lineNumber":153680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な……なんて奴だ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha... what kind of guy is that..."},{"lineNumber":153681,"originalJapaneseLine":"　穴の中で地面を掘ってやがる……」","translatedEnglishLine":" He's digging through the ground inside the hole...\""},{"lineNumber":153682,"originalJapaneseLine":"「落ち着け！　今にも出てくるぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stay calm! He'll come out any moment now!"},{"lineNumber":153683,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次の部隊、前に！　負傷者は下がれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Next unit, forward! The wounded, fall back!\""},{"lineNumber":153684,"originalJapaneseLine":"「相手を魔物と思うな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't think of the enemy as a mere monster!"},{"lineNumber":153685,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我らは今、自然災害を相手にしてるのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We are facing a natural disaster right now!\""},{"lineNumber":153686,"originalJapaneseLine":"（しかし、クッ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"(But, damn...!"},{"lineNumber":153687,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このままではいずれ破られる……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"At this rate, we'll be broken through sooner or later...!)"},{"lineNumber":153688,"originalJapaneseLine":"（撤退の合図はまだか……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Where is the signal to retreat...!)"},{"lineNumber":153689,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場に飛び交う怒号、叫び、指示、","translatedEnglishLine":"Shouts, screams, and commands flew across the battlefield,"},{"lineNumber":153690,"originalJapaneseLine":"その中心は間違いなく魔人シルキィであった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and at the center of it all was undoubtedly the demon lord Silky."},{"lineNumber":153691,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場――","translatedEnglishLine":"Battlefield—"},{"lineNumber":153692,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍左翼後方――","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army’s left rear—"},{"lineNumber":153693,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線でシルキィが戦っている地点より","translatedEnglishLine":"Further behind the front line where Silky was fighting,"},{"lineNumber":153694,"originalJapaneseLine":"更に後方では、魔物兵達が呑気に","translatedEnglishLine":"the monster troops were leisurely"},{"lineNumber":153695,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィの戦いを見守っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"watching Silky’s battle."},{"lineNumber":153696,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やれやれ、相変わらず","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good grief, as usual,"},{"lineNumber":153697,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無駄に時間かかってんなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"this is taking unnecessarily long—\""},{"lineNumber":153698,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このままじゃ腕が鈍っちまうな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At this rate, my skills will dull."},{"lineNumber":153699,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、前線で戦わされるよりはマシだけどよ」","translatedEnglishLine":" Well, it’s better than having to fight on the front lines, though.\""},{"lineNumber":153700,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィのいる戦線の基本的な戦法は","translatedEnglishLine":"The basic tactic at the front where Silky fought"},{"lineNumber":153701,"originalJapaneseLine":"負担をシルキィ一人に背負わせる","translatedEnglishLine":"was to put all the burden on Silky alone."},{"lineNumber":153702,"originalJapaneseLine":"安全かつ気楽なものである。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was safe and effortless for the others."},{"lineNumber":153703,"originalJapaneseLine":"それ故、シルキィと近い位置にいる魔物は","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, the monsters close to Silky"},{"lineNumber":153704,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただリーザス軍が崩れるのを待っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were simply waiting for the Liezas army to break."},{"lineNumber":153705,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーっ、まだかねぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa, not yet, huh...?"},{"lineNumber":153706,"originalJapaneseLine":"　退屈だねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":" This is boring...\""},{"lineNumber":153707,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわぁーー……ぐう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yawn... zzz...\""},

{"lineNumber":153708,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場――","translatedEnglishLine":"Battlefield—"},

{"lineNumber":153709,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍左翼――","translatedEnglishLine":"Liezas Army’s left wing—"},

{"lineNumber":153710,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィ達が戦っている右翼とは逆の地点、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the opposite location from the right wing where Silky and others fought,"},

{"lineNumber":153711,"originalJapaneseLine":"左翼側でもまたリーザス軍と魔軍の戦いが","translatedEnglishLine":"a battle between the Liezas army and the demon army was also underway on the left wing."},

{"lineNumber":153712,"originalJapaneseLine":"行われていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was happening."},

{"lineNumber":153713,"originalJapaneseLine":"1軍と2軍の混合軍の中、","translatedEnglishLine":"Among the mixed forces of the first and second armies,"},

{"lineNumber":153714,"originalJapaneseLine":"最前線に立たされた青の軍の副将、","translatedEnglishLine":"the vice-commander of the Blue Army, placed at the very front,"},

{"lineNumber":153715,"originalJapaneseLine":"キンケード・ブランブラは口内で舌を打つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kinkade Bramble clicked his tongue."},

{"lineNumber":153716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really..."} ,

{"lineNumber":153717,"originalJapaneseLine":"　矢面に立たされるのはいつも青の軍よ","translatedEnglishLine":" It’s always the Blue Army that gets placed on the front lines."},

{"lineNumber":153718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――と、愚痴を漏らしても詮無きこと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—Though complaining about it is pointless."},

{"lineNumber":153719,"originalJapaneseLine":"一つだけ溜め息を吐いてから、","translatedEnglishLine":"He sighed once,"},

{"lineNumber":153720,"originalJapaneseLine":"キンケードは気を入れ替えて味方の兵に檄を飛ばす。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Kinkade refocused, shouting encouragement to his troops."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ドサッ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Thud>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突如、地面が崩れ砂に隠されていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, the ground collapsed, revealing a hidden pit covered by sand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落とし穴にシルキィの巨体が落とされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky's massive body fell into the pitfall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （魔人に勝つことは不可能。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It is impossible to defeat the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らの任務はほんの少しでも多く時間を稼ぐこと）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our mission is to buy just a little more time.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その為の鉄網、その為の落とし穴である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why there are iron nets and pitfalls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人に勝てないことを把握しているリーザス軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Liezas army, aware they cannot defeat the demon lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いに耐え続け、ある程度時間を稼いだら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: endure the battle and once they have bought some time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐさま撤収か次の部隊に交代を繰り返していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately retreat or repeatedly switch to the next unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人に負けるのはいい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Losing to the demon lord is acceptable!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、いいか！　絶対に戦線は崩すな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But listen! Never let the front line collapse!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その間隙を突き、魔物共が雪崩れ込んでくるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters will crash through any gap!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ドォォォオオォォォン！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Doooooon!>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んなっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバ達のいる地面が突如として揺れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ground beneath Cordoba and the others suddenly shakes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは落とし穴の中でシルキィが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the sound of Silky inside the pitfall

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁に激突した音だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: crashing against the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてシルキィは土煙の中で姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, Silky disappeared amid a cloud of dust.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な……なんて奴だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha... what kind of guy is that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴の中で地面を掘ってやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's digging through the ground inside the hole..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「落ち着け！　今にも出てくるぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stay calm! He'll come out any moment now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の部隊、前に！　負傷者は下がれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next unit, forward! The wounded, fall back!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相手を魔物と思うな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't think of the enemy as a mere monster!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らは今、自然災害を相手にしてるのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are facing a natural disaster right now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （しかし、クッ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (But, damn...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままではいずれ破られる……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, we'll be broken through sooner or later...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （撤退の合図はまだか……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Where is the signal to retreat...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に飛び交う怒号、叫び、指示、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shouts, screams, and commands flew across the battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中心は間違いなく魔人シルキィであった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and at the center of it all was undoubtedly the demon lord Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battlefield—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍左翼後方――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army’s left rear—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線でシルキィが戦っている地点より
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Further behind the front line where Silky was fighting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に後方では、魔物兵達が呑気に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the monster troops were leisurely

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの戦いを見守っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: watching Silky’s battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やれやれ、相変わらず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief, as usual,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無駄に時間かかってんなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this is taking unnecessarily long—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままじゃ腕が鈍っちまうな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate, my skills will dull.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、前線で戦わされるよりはマシだけどよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it’s better than having to fight on the front lines, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィのいる戦線の基本的な戦法は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The basic tactic at the front where Silky fought

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負担をシルキィ一人に背負わせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was to put all the burden on Silky alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安全かつ気楽なものである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was safe and effortless for the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ故、シルキィと近い位置にいる魔物は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, the monsters close to Silky

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただリーザス軍が崩れるのを待っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were simply waiting for the Liezas army to break.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーっ、まだかねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa, not yet, huh...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 退屈だねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is boring..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわぁーー……ぐう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yawn... zzz..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battlefield—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍左翼――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Liezas Army’s left wing—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィ達が戦っている右翼とは逆の地点、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the opposite location from the right wing where Silky and others fought,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 左翼側でもまたリーザス軍と魔軍の戦いが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a battle between the Liezas army and the demon army was also underway on the left wing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行われていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was happening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 1軍と2軍の混合軍の中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the mixed forces of the first and second armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線に立たされた青の軍の副将、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the vice-commander of the Blue Army, placed at the very front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キンケード・ブランブラは口内で舌を打つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kinkade Bramble clicked his tongue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 矢面に立たされるのはいつも青の軍よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s always the Blue Army that gets placed on the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――と、愚痴を漏らしても詮無きこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Though complaining about it is pointless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つだけ溜め息を吐いてから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He sighed once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キンケードは気を入れ替えて味方の兵に檄を飛ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kinkade refocused, shouting encouragement to his troops.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

{"lineNumber":153716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really..."} ,

{"lineNumber":153717,"originalJapaneseLine":"　矢面に立たされるのはいつも青の軍よ","translatedEnglishLine":" It’s always the Blue Army that gets placed on the front lines."},

{"lineNumber":153718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――と、愚痴を漏らしても詮無きこと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—Though complaining about it is pointless."},

{"lineNumber":153719,"originalJapaneseLine":"一つだけ溜め息を吐いてから、","translatedEnglishLine":"He sighed once,"},

{"lineNumber":153720,"originalJapaneseLine":"キンケードは気を入れ替えて味方の兵に檄を飛ばす。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Kinkade refocused, shouting encouragement to his troops."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ドサッ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Thud>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突如、地面が崩れ砂に隠されていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, the ground collapsed, revealing a hidden pit covered by sand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落とし穴にシルキィの巨体が落とされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky's massive body fell into the pitfall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （魔人に勝つことは不可能。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (It is impossible to defeat the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らの任務はほんの少しでも多く時間を稼ぐこと）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our mission is to buy just a little more time.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その為の鉄網、その為の落とし穴である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why there are iron nets and pitfalls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人に勝てないことを把握しているリーザス軍は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Liezas army, aware they cannot defeat the demon lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いに耐え続け、ある程度時間を稼いだら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: endure the battle and once they have bought some time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐさま撤収か次の部隊に交代を繰り返していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately retreat or repeatedly switch to the next unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人に負けるのはいい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Losing to the demon lord is acceptable!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、いいか！　絶対に戦線は崩すな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But listen! Never let the front line collapse!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その間隙を突き、魔物共が雪崩れ込んでくるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters will crash through any gap!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ドォォォオオォォォン！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Doooooon!>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んなっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバ達のいる地面が突如として揺れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ground beneath Cordoba and the others suddenly shakes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは落とし穴の中でシルキィが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the sound of Silky inside the pitfall

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁に激突した音だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: crashing against the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてシルキィは土煙の中で姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, Silky disappeared amid a cloud of dust.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な……なんて奴だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha... what kind of guy is that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穴の中で地面を掘ってやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's digging through the ground inside the hole..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「落ち着け！　今にも出てくるぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stay calm! He'll come out any moment now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の部隊、前に！　負傷者は下がれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next unit, forward! The wounded, fall back!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相手を魔物と思うな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't think of the enemy as a mere monster!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らは今、自然災害を相手にしてるのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are facing a natural disaster right now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （しかし、クッ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (But, damn...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままではいずれ破られる……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this rate, we'll be broken through sooner or later...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （撤退の合図はまだか……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Where is the signal to retreat...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に飛び交う怒号、叫び、指示、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shouts, screams, and commands flew across the battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中心は間違いなく魔人シルキィであった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and at the center of it all was undoubtedly the demon lord Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battlefield—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍左翼後方――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army’s left rear—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線でシルキィが戦っている地点より
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Further behind the front line where Silky was fighting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に後方では、魔物兵達が呑気に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the monster troops were leisurely

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの戦いを見守っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: watching Silky’s battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やれやれ、相変わらず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief, as usual,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無駄に時間かかってんなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this is taking unnecessarily long—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままじゃ腕が鈍っちまうな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate, my skills will dull.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、前線で戦わされるよりはマシだけどよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it’s better than having to fight on the front lines, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィのいる戦線の基本的な戦法は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The basic tactic at the front where Silky fought

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負担をシルキィ一人に背負わせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was to put all the burden on Silky alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安全かつ気楽なものである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was safe and effortless for the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ故、シルキィと近い位置にいる魔物は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, the monsters close to Silky

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただリーザス軍が崩れるのを待っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were simply waiting for the Liezas army to break.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーっ、まだかねぇ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa, not yet, huh...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 退屈だねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is boring..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわぁーー……ぐう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yawn... zzz..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battlefield—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍左翼――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Liezas Army’s left wing—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィ達が戦っている右翼とは逆の地点、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the opposite location from the right wing where Silky and others fought,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 左翼側でもまたリーザス軍と魔軍の戦いが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a battle between the Liezas army and the demon army was also underway on the left wing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行われていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was happening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 1軍と2軍の混合軍の中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the mixed forces of the first and second armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線に立たされた青の軍の副将、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the vice-commander of the Blue Army, placed at the very front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キンケード・ブランブラは口内で舌を打つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kinkade Bramble clicked his tongue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 矢面に立たされるのはいつも青の軍よ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s always the Blue Army that gets placed on the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――と、愚痴を漏らしても詮無きこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Though complaining about it is pointless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つだけ溜め息を吐いてから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He sighed once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キンケードは気を入れ替えて味方の兵に檄を飛ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kinkade refocused, shouting encouragement to his troops.
